Key Match Events: Anrich Nortje recorded figures of 4-0-8-4, his best in T20Is
South Africa bundled Sri Lanka for 77, their lowest T20 score
South Africa won the match by 6 wickets with 4 overs to spare
Post-Match Reflections: Aiden Markram expressed happiness with the win
Wanindu Hasaranga reflected on the team's batting performance and the need for improvement
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium, New York
